java/liquibase/preconditions/DBMSPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00006 
00011 public class DBMSPrecondition implements Precondition {
00012     private String type;
00013 
00014 
00015     public DBMSPrecondition() {
00016     }
00017 
00018     public String getType() {
00019         return type;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public void setType(String atype) {
00023         this.type = atype.toLowerCase();
00024     }
00025 
00026 
00027     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException {
00028         String dbType = database.getTypeName();
00029         if (!type.equals(dbType)) {
00030             throw new PreconditionFailedException("DBMS Precondition failed: expected "+type+", got "+dbType, changeLog, this);
00031         }
00032     }
00033 
00034     public String getTagName() {
00035         return "dbms";
00036     }
00037 
00038 }
